title: JWT Token Expiry Validation Missing in API Gateway
description: Token expiration not validated before processing requests, potential auth bypass

title: SQL Injection Vulnerability in Provider Filter
description: Unsanitized user input in provider_filter parameter could allow SQL injection attacks

title: Memory Leak in Document Parser
description: Unclosed file handles in PDF parsing loop causing memory accumulation, 15MB per iteration

title: Rate Limiting Not Applied to File Upload Endpoint
description: File upload endpoint missing rate limit middleware, potential for resource exhaustion DoS

title: XSS Vulnerability in Admin Dashboard Search
description: User input in search field not escaped before rendering, potential DOM XSS attack

title: JWT Token Expiry Validation Missing in API Gateway
description: Token expiration not validated before processing requests, potential auth bypass

title: SQL Injection Vulnerability in Provider Filter
description: Unsanitized user input in provider_filter parameter could allow SQL injection attacks

title: Unvalidated Redirect in OAuth Callback
description: OAuth callback URL not validated, could redirect to malicious domains

title: Memory Leak in Document Parser
description: Unclosed file handles in PDF parsing loop causing memory accumulation, 15MB per iteration

title: Previously Fixed: JWT Token Expiry (Regression)
description: JWT validation regression detected - same issue re-occurred after merge from feature branch

title: Rate Limiting Not Applied to File Upload Endpoint
description: File upload endpoint missing rate limit middleware, potential for resource exhaustion DoS

title: Sensitive Data Logged in Application Logs
description: API keys and session tokens are being logged in plain text, violating HIPAA/SOC2 compliance

title: XSS Vulnerability in Admin Dashboard Search
description: User input in search field not escaped before rendering, potential DOM XSS attack

title: Fix Migration 014 Revision Variables
description: Migration 014 (add_login_lockout_table.py) is missing revision and down_revision Alembic variables. This blocks the migration from running. Task: Add revision='014_login_lockout' and down_revision='013_rls_policies' to the migration file header.

title: Add RLS Context to All User-Scoped Endpoints
description: User-scoped endpoints must call SET LOCAL app context variables for RLS policies to function. Task: Create helper function in dependencies.py and apply to all endpoints that access user data.

title: Test RLS Policies with 3 User Roles
description: Verify that RLS policies correctly enforce access control for provider, admin, and superadmin roles. Test privilege escalation prevention. Task: Create comprehensive RLS test suite with 3 test users.

title: Migrate Login Lockout to Database-Backed Storage
description: Login lockout tracking currently uses in-memory storage and doesn't survive server restarts. Task: Use LoginLockout model for persistent storage and update middleware to query DB.

title: Verify Immutability Triggers Block Updates/Deletes
description: Audit logs, document lineage, and credential versions must be immutable. Verify that DELETE and UPDATE attempts are properly blocked. Task: Create test suite to confirm immutability triggers work.

title: Activate Rate Limiting in Production Mode
description: Rate limiting is currently disabled for local development. Task: Enable rate limiting in production, verify 100 req/min limit works, and test login attempt throttling (5 attempts per 15 minutes).

title: Generate V2 Router Endpoints from Schemas
description: Once credentialmate-schemas is provided, generate FastAPI router files for all V2 endpoints. Task: Create base v2 router structure with 60+ endpoints following OpenAPI contract.

title: Implement V2 Endpoint Business Logic
description: Implement core business logic for all V2 endpoints. Task: Build endpoint handlers with proper RLS, validation, and error handling.

title: Create V2 API Contract Tests
description: Create comprehensive contract tests for V2 API endpoints. Task: Build test suite covering all endpoints, success cases, and error conditions.

title: Validate V2 API Contract Compliance
description: Verify V2 API endpoints match OpenAPI contract specification. Task: Create compliance test suite comparing implementation to spec.

title: Audit V1 API Usage in Frontend
description: Map all frontend code that uses v1 API to identify what needs migration. Task: Create dependency graph of v1 API calls.

title: Migrate Frontend Pages to V2 API
description: Update all frontend pages to use v2 API endpoints. Task: Migrate pages one by one, verifying functionality.

title: Remove V1 API Module from Frontend
description: Once all pages migrated to v2, remove the v1 api.ts module. Task: Delete legacy API code and verify no imports remain.

title: Restore Dashboard Server-Side Rendering
description: Dashboard currently uses client-side rendering due to v1 API issues. Restore SSR once v2 API is available. Task: Re-enable SSR in pages/dashboard.tsx.

title: Standardize Frontend Error Handling
description: Frontend error handling is inconsistent across pages. Task: Create centralized error handling utilities and apply to all pages.

title: Achieve 70%+ Test Coverage for React Query Integration
description: Frontend lacks sufficient test coverage for React Query hooks. Task: Write tests to reach 70% coverage on React Query integration.

title: HIPAA Compliance Verification (Milestone 3)
description: Verify HIPAA requirements are met: HIPAA-001, 004, 006, 008, 009. Task: Create verification checklist and test results.

title: SOC2 Compliance Verification (Milestone 3)
description: Verify SOC2 requirements are met: CC6.1, CC8.1. Task: Create verification checklist and test results.

title: Generate V2 Router Endpoints from Schemas
description: Generate FastAPI router files for all V2 endpoints following Data Bible v2.0 domain models. Task: Create base v2 router structure with 60+ endpoints.

title: Generate V2 Router Endpoints from Schemas
description: Generated 70 FastAPI router endpoints from Data Bible v2.0 domain models following RESTful conventions, RLS patterns, and comprehensive documentation.
fix_summary: Successfully generated 70 V2 API router endpoints across 7 domains (Provider, License, CME, Document, Compliance, Notification, Audit) following Data Bible v2.0 specification. All endpoints implement RLS enforcement, Pydantic validation, comprehensive docstrings, and RESTful conventions. Routers registered in main.py, documentation created. Ready for M2-T3 business logic implementation.
